item.description:
Okay, all... One of the problems with finding large venues for a couple hours is cost. We have a choice: rent space and have everyone pitch in to get nothing but the space to meet, or buy some of their food. Personally, I would much rather pay for a meal out once a month. Soooo (seriously), I shouldn't have to say this, but come with the expectation of getting something off the menu, a drink, SOMEthing, or we are going to get charged anyhow!

They have a decent buffet going til 8:00 - $12 per person.

See ya'll there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the person who resembles my profile image, but ask at the entry anyhow!
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group December Meetup
